IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: EXPAND THE UNDERSTANDING OF CONSERVATIVE PRINCIPLES AND PHILOSOPHY IN SOCIETY AND CULTURE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: EXPAND THE UNDERSTANDING OF CONSERVATIVE PRINCIPLES AND PHILOSOPHY IN SOCIETY AND CULTURE.
IRS990.Desc: PROMOTE ACTIVITIES THAT EXPAND THE UNDERSTANDING OF CONSERVATIVE PRINCIPLES AND PHILOSOPHY IN SOCIETY AND CULTURE BY EDUCATING AND INFORMING THE GENERAL PUBLIC IN THE FIELDS OF POLITICAL SCIENCE, HISTORY, FREE MARKET ECONOMICS, RELIGION AND WESTERN CIVILIZATION.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: MISCELLANEOUS - 2019 AMOUNT: $ 20. 2020 AMOUNT: $ 105,637. FUNDRAISING PROCEEDS - 2021 AMOUNT: $ 53,400. 2022 AMOUNT: $ 134,550.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NATIONAL REVIEW INSTITUTE IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC) AND THEREFORE THERE IS NO PROVISION FOR FEDERAL OR STATE INCOME TAXES IN THE ACCOMPANYING CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE INSTITUTE, WHICH IS HEADQUARTERED IN NEW YORK IS RECOGNIZED FOR TAX EXEMPT STATUS IN THE STATE OF NEW YORK. THE INSTITUTE HAS BEEN DETERMINED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE (IRS) NOT TO BE A "PRIVATE FOUNDATION" WITHIN THE MEANING OF SECTION 509(A)(1) OF THE IRC. OTHER SIGNIFICANT TAX POSITIONS INCLUDE ITS DETERMINATION OF WHETHER ANY AMOUNTS ARE SUBJECT TO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX (UBIT). MANAGEMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE INSTITUTE HAD NO ACTIVITIES SUBJECT TO UBIT FOR THE YEARS ENDED JULY 31, 2023 OR 2022. ALL SIGNIFICANT TAX POSITIONS HAVE BEEN CONSIDERED BY MANAGEMENT AND IT HAS BEEN DETERMINED THAT ALL TAX POSITIONS WOULD BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATIONS BY TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE INSTITUTE IS REQUIRED TO FILE FORM 990 (RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX), WHICH IS GENERALLY SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE IRS UP TO THREE YEARS FROM THE EXTENDED DUE DATE OF THE RETURN. THE FORMS 990 FOR 2020 THROUGH 2022 ARE OPEN TO EXAMINATION BY THE IRS AS OF JULY 31, 2023.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SPONSOR THE NR REVIEW OF BOOKS, MOVIES AND OTHER CULTURAL MATERIALS.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: INVESTMENT - IN JULY 2023, NATIONAL REVIEW INSTITUTE MADE A CONTRIBUTION OF $3,000,000.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AMOUNT IN COLUMN B REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF ITEMS CONTRIBUTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE NO COMMITTEES OF THE GOVERNING BODY WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRESIDENT, AND VICE PRESIDENT REVIEW FORM AND CONTENT OF TAX RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: POLICY COMPLIANCE MONITORED THROUGH REGULARY ATTENDED FORMAL AND INFORMAL MEETINGS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT BASED UPON PREVAILING SALARY LEVELS COMMENSURATE WITH EXPERIENCE AND REVIEWED BY THE GOVERNING BODY AND COUNCIL. COMPENSATION OF OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES BASED UPON PREVAILING SALARY LEVELS COMMENSURATE WITH EXPERIENCE AND REVIEWED BY THE GOVERNING BODY AND COUNCIL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE KEPT AT THE ORGANIZATION'S LOCATION AND CAN BE VIEWED BY ANY INQUIRING PARTY DURING NORMAL OFFICE HOURS. HARD COPIES ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. THE FORM 990 IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON THE GUIDESTAR WEBSITE @ WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG.

THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COMMITTEE THAT ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. FOR FISCAL YEAR ENDED 7/31/2023, THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN THE AUDIT COMMITTEE PROCEDURES AND THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT CHANGED ITS SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT AUDITOR.
